name: Greater Spellcasting
desc: This item can be used to cast one or two spells, or many spells if created for a spellcaster. Using it to cast spells expends charges, and the item regains charges at dawn.

name: Healing
desc: This item can restore hit points to creatures, cure them of curses, diseases, or poisons, regrow their lost body parts, or resurrect them.

name: Magic Attack
desc: This item has a magical attack unique to itself.

name: Blessing
desc: The user of this item can use it to grants some temporary boon to their allies, such as temporary hit points, additional damage with attacks, bonuses to rolls, or advantage on certain checks or saves.

name: Conditions
desc: This item inflicts a condition upon enemies (blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, or asleep, diseased, insane, etc).

name: Damaging
desc: This item can be used to deal extra damage of some type to foes, such as fire, cold, lightning, thunder, acid, or poison.

name: Elemental
desc: This item can be used to conjure or manipulate air, earth, fire, water, lightning, heat, cold, acid, or another element.

name: Foe
desc: This item is designed to fight monsters of a certain type. It may warn its user when such enemies are near, be extra effective against them in combat, weaken them when they are nearby, prevent them from approaching its user, or banish them to their plane of origin.

name: Protective
desc: This item grants a boost to its user's AC, saves, or maximum hit points, or grants them temporary hit points, protection against a certain type of attack (such as projectile weapons), advantage on saving throws on spells. It might make its user take half damage when failing certain save-for-half rolls or no damage on a success. It might also have the ability to temporarily grant advanced protection.

name: Stealth
desc: This item is made for stealth or disguise. It might mask its user's appearance, prevent them from making noise, or turn them invisible.

name: Transforming
desc: This item can transform into a different type of item with a different function, or many different types of item. For instance, a sword that can transform into a bladed whip, or hide itself by transforming into a cane.

name: Athletic
desc: This item enables its user to climb or swim better, increases their jump distance, allows them to walk on walls, removes penalties from difficult terrain, reduces fall damage, or has some other similar ability.

name: Aquatic
desc: This item grants its user a swim speed, water breathing, or both, or it grants some other underwater-appropriate power.

name: Charged
desc: This item allows its user to deal damage to objects or enemies by expending health, spell slots, or another resource.

name: Communication
desc: This item allows its user to speak (normally or telepathically) with creatures far away, creatures they do not share a language with, or things that cannot normally speak such as plants and animals.

name: Conjuring
desc: This item can conjure one or more types of creature. The creatures may be loyal, reluctant, or hostile, depending on their nature.

name: Container
desc: This item magically stores a multitude of non-magical items (such as rope, arrows, or oil), or disposable magic items (such as healing potions or magic beans), which can be removed when needed. The items it contains do not increase its weight.

name: Cursing
desc: This item inflicts a curse upon foes. It may prevent them from taking certain actions, reduce their maximum hit points, or render them unable to be healed.

name: Demiplane
desc: This item is linked to a demiplane which can contain items or creatures. It may be used for storage, or for something else. A weaker item might have a small, empty demiplane, but a stronger item may have a larger demiplane with its own native environment or even permanent inhabitants.

name: Ethereal
desc: This item can transport its user, enemies struck with it, items, or something else to and from the Border Ethereal.

name: Explosive
desc: This item can be used to cause massive damage to all creatures, items, and terrain within a specific radius. It can likely be thrown, as its user is not immune.

name: Flight
desc: This item grants its user the power of flight or levitation.

name: Illusory
desc: This item conjures up specific illusions, which may disguise itself or its user, or be able to move and act independently for a short time.

name: Light/Darkness
desc: This item glows brightly when its user wills it, and its light may even be sunlight. If evil, it might instead cloak the area around it in magical darkness.

name: Limited Spells
desc: Parts of this item can be torn off and expended to cast powerful spells.

name: Lucky
desc: If this item's user rolls poorly on certain saves or checks, it may allow them a reroll or an automatic success.

name: Magic Shield
desc: This item immunizes its user against scrying, mind reading, fear, charm, or some other undesirable magical effect.

name: Mind Control
desc: This item allows its user to attempt to mind control other creatures.

name: Resistant
desc: This item grants resistance to a certain type of damage, or immunity to poison or psychic damage.

name: Safe Zone
desc: This item temporarily protects its user and their allies within a small area. Creatures in the area may be protected from attacks from outside, regain hit points at the start of their turn, or some similar effect.

name: Sensory
desc: This item grants its user specific senses, such as darkvision, blindsight, tremorsense, truesight (if it's especially powerful), a bonus to perception, or the ability to sense magic. It may be an item that must be used, such as a lens that gives the user darksight while looking through it or a torch that reveals invisible creatures and objects touched by its light, or it might simply impart these senses upon its user.

name: Shapeshifting
desc: This item can polymorph its user into a different type of creature.

name: Speedy
desc: This item enables its user to move or take certain actions more quickly. It most likely enables them to do something that normally requires a full action as a bonus action.

name: Survival
desc: This item allows its user to survive without food or water, without air, in places of extreme heat or cold, or in planes hostile to life itself.

name: Teleportation
desc: This item can teleport creatures or items, either short range (such as a place the user can see) or long range (such as another place on the same plane).

name: Unfolding
desc: This item can transform into a large item, such as a boat, cabin, or fortress.

name: Animal
desc: This item is made for a non-sentient companion, such as a horse, or it has the power to manipulate certain animals.

name: Antimagic
desc: This item cancels or dispels certain types of magic, such as necromancy spells, teleportation magic, healing magic, psychic powers, or spells cast below 4th level.

name: Animate
desc: This item acts on its own when its user wills it.

name: Animating
desc: This item can create temporary or permanent constructs to serve its user.

name: Astral
desc: This item has some connection to the astral plane, such as enabling its user to astrally project.

name: Attractive/Repulsive
desc: This item can be used to push, pull, grab, or grapple items or creatures.

name: Bulwark
desc: The user of this item has advantage on saving throws made to maintain concentration.

name: Concealing
desc: This item can conjure sand, fog, magical darkness, or some other means of concealing its user.

name: Deadly
desc: This item can be used to wound a creature, sever its limbs or head, or kill it instantly.

name: Destructive
desc: This item can obliterate certain types of matter (or just anything).

name: Divination
desc: This item has a very limited ability to see or predict the future.

name: Immovable
desc: This item can be stuck to a creature or object, or affixed to a particular point, and is extremely difficult to remove.

name: Locator
desc: This item knows the direction to the nearest object or location of a certain type, such as food, running water, temples to a specific god, or interplanar portals.

name: Magic Absorption
desc: This item can absorb spells of a certain level or below, cancelling them or turning them into hit points or spell slots for its user. An especially powerful item might be able to redirect spells at their caster.

name: Magic Detection
desc: This item can detect nearby magic, and may be able to identify it to some degree.

name: Magic Storing
desc: This item can be used to restore spell slots or some other resource expended by its user, or it can store spells cast into it.

name: Observer
desc: This item can impart its user with some knowledge of the surrounding area, such as a map, the locations of traps, or the types of creature nearby.

name: Planar Travel
desc: This item can transport the user or a group of people to another plane of existence, temporary or permanently, or banish enemies there.

name: Polymorphic
desc: This item can transform into a particular type of creature or other living thing, usually a non-sentient or semi-sentient creature.

name: Random
desc: When used, this item causes a random effect. It has a mix of harmful and helpful effects.

name: Restraining
desc: This item can prevent creatures from moving, taking certain actions, or teleporting, or it can imprison them.

name: Safeguard
desc: This item protects its user against death. It might allow them to drop to 1 hit point instead of falling unconscious, automatically stabilize them when knocked out, or allow their soul to remain on the plane for resurrection after they die.

name: Scanner
desc: This item can impart its user with some knowledge of nearby creatures, such as their thoughts, alignment, weaknesses, or if they are shapeshifted.

name: Size-changing
desc: This item can change the size of itself, its user, or something else.

name: Stat Boost
desc: This item increases one of its user's ability scores to a certain number, or has no effect if their ability score is higher than that number. It likely increases a stat that its intended user would be poor at (for instance, intelligence for a barbarian).

name: Terrain-altering
desc: This item can alter the nearby terrain. It turns normal terrain into difficult terrain, grow trees, conjure stone spikes or walls, or dig holes in the ground, or it has some other similar effect.

name: Transmuting
desc: This item can transmute one type of item or substance into another, or create inexpensive items or substances out of nothing (such as food, water, or rope).

name: Vampiric
desc: This item can steal hit points from creatures and use them to empower itself or its user.

name: Weather Control
desc: This item can control the local weather or climate. It is a rare and valuable item.

name: Wish-granting
desc: This item can grant its user wishes. It is an extremely rare and valuable item.
